channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6910|2024-08-28T08:13:59.192Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: A vulnerable API method in M-Files Server before 23.12.13195.0 allows for uncontrolled resource consumption. Authenticated attacker can exhaust server storage space to a point where the server can no longer serve requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-6912|2024-08-28T08:06:13.495Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Lack of protection against brute force attacks in M-Files Server before 23.12.13205.0 allows an attacker unlimited authentication attempts, potentially compromising targeted M-Files user accounts by guessing passwords.

item.title: CVE-2024-6124|2024-08-27T10:52:19.231Z -- m-files%20corporation -- hubshare
item.description: Reflected XSS in M-Files Hubshare before version 5.0.6.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the context of the victim's browser session

item.title: CVE-2024-5142|2024-08-27T10:50:11.915Z -- m-files%20corporation -- hubshare
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Social Module in M-Files Hubshare before version 5.0.6.0 allows authenticated attacker to run scripts in other users browser

item.title: CVE-2024-6881|2024-08-27T10:54:23.772Z -- m-files%20corporation -- hubshare
item.description: Stored XSS in M-Files Hubshare versions before 5.0.6.0 allows an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript in user's browser session

item.title: CVE-2024-4056|2024-08-27T10:47:45.585Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Denial of service condition in M-Files Server in versions before 24.4.13592.4 and after 23.11 (excluding 24.2 LTS) allows unauthenticated user to consume computing resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-5142|2024-08-23T13:50:34.984Z -- m-files%20corporation -- hubshare
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Social Module in M-Files Hubshare before version 5.0.3.8 allows authenticated attacker to run scripts in other users browser

item.title: CVE-2023-4479|2024-06-04T17:27:12.142Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20web
item.description: Stored XSS Vulnerability in M-Files Web versions before 23.8 allows attacker to execute script on users browser via stored HTML document within limited time period.
